about_the_game:
I suddenly received Herbert Lee's call for help in an ordinary morning.

He said his wife and daughter disappeared overnight and all his wife's daily necessities disappeared too. But the police cannot place the case on file because it did not reach 48 hours yet. So, Lee can only call me for help.

I am a policeman. As an elite agent of the Cyber Security Investigation Department (CSID) in Alivia, tracing people is not a difficult task for me. However, at the initial stage of the investigation, I find some clues: Lee's wife has a big problem!

Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets: Lee has divorced from his ex-wife for many years and he is about to marry his new wife. The wedding diamond ring has almost cost all his savings; His wife Theresa's behavior based on my investigation is completely inconsistent with Lee's description. Which face is the real one? His daughter Claudia looks clever, well-behaved, and academic performance among the best. But after hacking her social account, I find her unbelievable secret ......

Theresa and Claudia bogged down in an endanger life, but I ......

Should I save them?

More Information:
  • A New Chapter in DLC
  • Optimizing the Animation during the game which make better experience
  • New UI Design
  • Add Dragging Clues in the game which make better operation
  • Add Some New Mini Games during the Puzzles

Thank you so much for your support to Cyber Manhunt. We will keep doing our best to my game.
